actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional itemized deduction in the case of an individual who rents his principal residence (or who rents a site for a mobile home used as his principal residence).

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction from gross income of 25 percent of the aggregate rent paid for a taxpayer's principal residence or for sites for a mobile home used as his principal residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional itemized deduction in the case of an individual who rents his principal residence (or who rents a site for a mobile home used as his principal residence).
